fields.description: Need to show the Titanium startup splash screen while the app loads. It needs to be defined by a html and css file. There needs to be tiapp.xml options to disable screen. At compile time, the compiler will need to check if the app has a startup screen to override the default Titanium startup screen.
fields.summary: MobileWeb: Add support for startup images
